trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow bandit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow bandit to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow bandit has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.
